title: How to prepare for the NEET 2021 starting from now without coaching? What books should I refer to - Quora

response.answer_text: OKAYY … first of all thankyou for the question… Now try to follow all the steps below Clear the concepts of all chapters from physics, chemistry and biology.. if you want someones help to do that..you can subscribe vedantu free online classes on youtube .. for biology there is vedantu vbiotonic rhere you can find a perfect guider vani maam…You can join allen DLP if you want. so that you can give monthly test of them..practicing question papers are more important for neetAfter clearing concepts of each chapters solve chapterwise objective questions .. this will make you to know the way of approaching questions..make good short notes to revise the topics everyday…give mocktests… mark the questions u made wrong …. make a note which includes all the questions and answers which you made wrong or left… this note will be good for last month revision..you can buy mtg fingertips for physics chemistry and biology… its a good book covering al type of objectives coming from a chapter…read ncert throroughly… for biology ncert is really important… u have to visualise all the sentence then only u will understand…weekly revision is must for all the subjects dont forget that bcoz if you skip this test you will be on trouble ….be a consistent performer… dont lose your confidence…if you are scoring bad in the tests dont think that you are not eligible for neet …. instead of that analyse the question paper and make error notestudy well… you can do it… all the best varshh…

If you are not interested in joining coaching institutes like aakash or allen u must atleast enroll urself in distance learning course in any of these 2 institute... This is because you will be provided with study materials and eligible to give online tests time to time which is very necessary to Crack NEET. Study materials of both aakash and allen are more than sufficient.. No need to buy any reference books as it will be waste of money ... Buy only ncert books or the text books prescribed by other respective boards . My suggestion is to join classroom programme in allen or aakash….no need of joining even pvt tuition class as they are sufficient. Save time.... Don't waste money on unnecessary books and tuition teachers...If you are enrolling in coaching institute then never lag behind the class... Give tests time to time... Ultimately hard work will not bring 100 percent success... It's the smart work which will help you to crack neet with flying colors... All the best dear

Without coaching it is tough to prepare for NEET but not impossible start your preparation from NCERT because it is the main and important book for the preparation so that please start quick Please clear all concepts basics with that please refer formula as well for the preparation Make NOTES of important points so that you can revise all those points on a daily basis For preparation here I'm suggesting you few books HC VERMA for physics O.P.TANDAN for Chemistry TRUEMAN for Biology These three books are perfect for the exam preparation For more details regarding NEET preparation and also you can get any other updates regarding NEET please visit TOPPR APPLICATION Thank you 👍

firstly focus on understanding class 11 and class 12 concepts and after that focus on scoring good marks in class 12 boards and then for these 2 years ncerts of all 3 subjects are just not to be ignored practice along with mocks and practice a lot
